description: List of users with page parameters

requests.curl:
curl -g "http://0.0.0.0/v1/users?page=2&per_page=1" -X GET \
	-H "Accept: application/json" \
	-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
	-H "Lang: en" \
	-H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJzdWIiOjkzMTB9.5Atjo1x3sprpb-RDrcgJcoyAtI3iTiYp1IJ5mKoqZsc"
